original: Hoppe, Ernst Fredrik (Fritz), kyrkoherde, Mogata, f. 2/3/84 i Hogstad, östergötl. 1. G. 12 m. Brita Svensson. Barn: Sten f. 14, Nils 15, Karin 19, Ingrid 21. — Mog:ex. i Norrköp. 03, teol. fil. ex. 04, teol. kand., prakt, teol. ex. samt prästv. f. Linköp. stift 07. V. kommin. i Skällvik 07, v. pastor i Kristdala 09, pastorsadj. i Motala s. å., v. kommin. i Högbj^ o. Hogstad 11, tf. kyrkoh. i Mogata 16, ord. sed. 19. Ordf. i skolstyr., kyrkoråd, kyrkostämma, past:stämma, komm:fullm., komm :stämma. LVO.
translated: Hoppe, Ernst Fredrik (Fritz), vicar, Mogata, b. March 2, 1884 in Hogstad, Östergötland. Married first to Brita Svensson in 19xx. Children: Sten b. 1914, Nils b. 1915, Karin b. 1919, Ingrid b. 1921. Educated at Mogata's teacher training college in Norrköping in 1903, theology degree in 1904, Master of Theology degree, practical theological exam, and ordination from Linköping diocese in 1907. Worked as assistant pastor in Skällvik in 1907, assistant pastor in Kristdala in 1909, pastor's assistant in Motala the same year, assistant pastor in Högbj^ and Hogstad in 1911, acting vicar in Mogata in 1916, and vicar since 1919. Was chairman of the school board, church council, church assembly, pastor's assembly, municipal council, and municipal assembly. Awarded the LVO (Order of Vasa) honor.

structured.name: Ernst Fredrik (Fritz) Hoppe
structured.description: Ernst Fredrik (Fritz) Hoppe was a Swedish vicar born on March 2, 1884 in Hogstad, Östergötland. He was educated at Mogata's teacher training college in Norrköping in 1903, received a theology degree in 1904, Master of Theology degree, practical theological exam, and ordination from Linköping diocese in 1907. He worked his way up from being an assistant pastor in Skällvik in 1907, assistant pastor in Kristdala in 1909, pastor's assistant in Motala the same year, assistant pastor in Högbj^ and Hogstad in 1911, acting vicar in Mogata in 1916, and finally became a vicar since 1919. Hoppe was also actively involved in various organizations and held several positions such as chairman of the school board, church council, church assembly, pastor's assembly, municipal council, and municipal assembly. He was awarded the LVO (Order of Vasa) honor.
